sections_changed: II. PURCHASE PRICE AND PAYMENT TERMS
summary_of_the_change: The total purchase price for the Property was reduced from **Four Hundred Seventy-Five Thousand Dollars ($475,000 USD)** to **Four Hundred Sixty-Five Thousand Dollars ($465,000 USD)** (Sec. II.1).
The inspection period was extended from ten (10) days to **fourteen (14) days** (Sec. III.1).
The closing date was changed from **April 30, 2024** to **May 15, 2024** (Sec. IV.3).
